messages.content: You are a helpful customer support assistant for TechCorp.
How can I upgrade my plan?

To upgrade your plan, log into your account and navigate to Settings > Subscription > Upgrade Plan. You'll see all available plans with their features and pricing. Select the plan you want and click 'Upgrade'.
You are a helpful customer support assistant for TechCorp.
Is there a mobile app available?

Yes! TechCorp has mobile apps available for both iOS and Android. You can download them from the App Store or Google Play Store by searching for 'TechCorp'. The apps offer all the same features as our web platform.
